overview: Markus Jaquemar is biologist and an internationally experienced sales and marketing professional. Markus started his career at Beckman Coulter, soon becoming CEO of the German subsidiary. Before joining Anagnostics, Markus was responsible for the global marketing of the life science portfolio of Agilent Technologies, a life science giant with 20,000 employees. There he served a 4.5 years term. In total Markus worked for more than 19 years in the life science industry in Austria, Germany and Switzerland. Since June 2009 he is responsible for marketing and sales. His aim is to provide our customers with clear benefits and reliable products.
